page.title: 08Nettlesworth-Police Horses
page.content:
One of the children had this to say about the visit of the Police Horses : " 7th June - There were two of them. One was brown, he was 15 years old and his name was Sterling. The other horse was white, he was 20 years old and his name was Eddiscome. P.C Hewitson rode Eddiscome and P.C Jefferson rode Sterling. Sterling was bigger than Eddiscome and his legs were fatter and stronger but Eddiscome was Police Horse of the Year. Police horses have to train for about 12-18 months. They have to learn to walk backwards and sideways and have to keep crowds under control."
By Sarah Wright.
